INSERT INTO messages_history (
  tenant_id,
  appeal_id,
  message_type,
  message_text,
  channel, channel_id,
  external_message_id,
  external_chat_id
)
SELECT
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
  'agent',
  {{ $json.text ? "'" + $json.text.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "NULL" }},
  'telegram',
  (SELECT id FROM channels WHERE code = 'telegram' LIMIT 1),
  '{{ $json.message_id }}',
  'tg_{{ $json.chat_id }}'
RETURNING *;
